name: Infinite Relay
description:
Controls:

SPACE - To Jump over the hurdles & to Pass the baton to the next member as he approaches you!

The infinite relay! The greatest test of mankind!  Keep jumping over hurdles and passing the batons to go on for as long as your strength takes you!

P.S: Game runs really bad with firefox, it runs slightly better with chromium/edge, it runs the best downloaded! Please download and give it a try if possible :3 I accidentally didn't take care of the resolution properly so it got pretty bloated, will update the game later once the jam voting period is over!

Made for Lost Relic Game Jam

Made with GDevelop
